name: Akanksha Foundation
about: Akanksha Foundation aims to deliver high quality education children of all backgrounds through after school programs and helping Government Schools create scalable school models through the School Project.
impact: S.S.C Pass Percentage in 2017-2018: 5% Pass Class, 21% Second Class, 73% Distinction or First Class
75% of parents in Akanksha Schools participating in School Management Committees

compensation.description: Oversee initiatives, build a team of skilled teachers, develop a strong academic program, engage with the parents and create a positive culture in the school
Help children achieve academic achievement and inculcate self-esteem and values
Become role models of or friends with the children at Akanksha

locations.street_address: The Akanksha Foundation, Voltas House, Z Block Building, 2nd floor, T B Kadam Marg, Chinchpokli -East
The Akanksha Foundation, New Thermax Building, Next to Sai Chambers, Old Bombay Pune Highway Road Wakdewadi
